pr_title: [BC-312] Update api handling of missing state

timeline.message: Update validator/duties to handle missing state
Get state root from block rather than state
Update /beacon/validators to return gone status when state is missing
Update beacon/committees to handle missing state

timeline.bodyText: nit: most of the time function name, then should, like queryBySlot_shouldReturnNoContentIfHeadRootMissing
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText:
There are 2 styles of test names that I typically use / have seen:

methodName_variationA_variationB
shouldDoX_variationA

I prefer the first style, but these tests are just invoking an http endpoint, so there's not really a method name to use.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.author: rolfyone
rolfyone

timeline.bodyText:
have we removed this test and re-tasked it?
the intent of this test was to show that an empty list is returned on an empty list passed in, and that's to be consistent with another API, so we should retain that intent in the testing.
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: It looked to me as if we were using the empty list to just represent no data, so I cut this since we're now using Optional's to represent no data.  I've gone back and added some short-circuit logic that will return an empty list if an empty list of public keys are provided, and added some more tests.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.bodyText: i'd still like a test to show behaviour on future epoch, and we definitely want that not cached
timeline.author: rolfyone

timeline.bodyText: if we're returning a result of 'SC_GONE', that can totally be cached, so this does look like a scenario we want to dig into if cache says none here. We'd be better off not setting the header at all and letting default behaviour happen potentially
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: Added tests to check the cache.  If we're querying against a finalized state, we'll set CACHE_FINALIZED otherwise CACHE_NONE.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.bodyText: as long as the slot is historical this is probably ok, might need another test case showing a future slot is not setting SC_GONE
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: Updated to set the status based on whether slot is finalized.  If its finalized, we'll set the status to 410 GONE, if non-final we set it to 404 NOT_FOUND.  Added tests shouldHandleMissingStateAtFinalizedSlot and shouldHandleMissingStateAtNonFinalSlot.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: I tend to stay away from static imports for the most part 🤷‍♀
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.message: If epoch is non-final, return 404 in /beacon/committees
Update beacon/state to set status based on finalization status of slot
Update /validator/duties to set status based on epoch finalization
Update /validator/duties to return empty list if no keys are supplied
Update /beacon/validators to return status depending on finalization
Update /beacon/validators to set status based on epoch finalization
Update /beacon/validators to return empty list if pubkeys is empty
